item.title: Very slippery pavement due to wet leaves, 16th December
item.description:
Pavements like in light life between park avenue and Hazelwood have spots with dense amount of leaves constantly wet in the morning and evening and extremely slippery. Witnessed various kids and folks close to fall.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lightcliffe Road, Palmers Green, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaves turning into Mud and Blocked Road Gulley, 16th December
item.description:
The road, outside 26 Haycroft Road, is covered in rotting leave and apples from fruit trees, causing the road to be covered in mud and a blocked road gully.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Haycroft Road, Brixton, Greater London

item.title: Small truck/car carrier badly parked on the corner, 16th December
item.description:
This truck/car carrier is badly parked on the corner and has been there with the same car on its flat bed for the past week. Its causing traffic flow issues at the corner as cars have to wait turn right into the road when other cars are turning out of the road due to the limited space to pass that truck

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Magpie Hall Lane, Southborough, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street needs better cleaning lot left behind, 16th December
item.description:
Top of the street is constantly littered by boxes, bottle, plastic of various type and cigarettes at the back of fried chicken shop which is not kept in a decorous way. This adds to the indecent status of the alleyway at the back of the (council I believe?) flats. We need more do e as the situation encourages various antisocial behaviours, also reported to the police.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 364, Green Lanes, Palmers Green, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
